tool.name: PubChem Download
tool.command: get_pubchem_as_smiles.py -o $pubchem_smi -p "\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}" ## temporary hack until my Galaxy patch is committed > /dev/null 2>&1

param.name: infile
param.label: Load all pubchem files and convert them to canonical smiles.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What this tool does**
This tool will fetch one PubChem_ file after another and convert them to canonical SMILES.
.. _PubChem: http://pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Output**
The output will be one large SMILES file.
